languages.text: "Хм-м-м". {n}Одрябшая кожа регента сотрясается от глубокого вздоха.{/n} "С нашей стороны было бы крайне непочтительно отказываться от помощи Вольного Торговца. Мы, Ааронто Орселлио, принимаем ваше предложение. C вашего позволения, обсудим детали позже".

traits.locale_text: "Хм-м-м". {n}Одрябшая кожа регента сотрясается от глубокого вздоха.{/n} "С нашей стороны было бы крайне непочтительно отказываться от помощи Вольного Торговца. Мы, Ааронто Орселлио, принимаем ваше предложение. C вашего позволения, обсудим детали позже".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “嗯嗯。”{n}摄政王叹了口气，下垂的皮肤颤抖着。{/n}“如果我们拒绝行商浪人的援助，那恐怕就太缺乏尊重了。我们，阿伦托·奥赛罗，在此接受您的提议。如果您愿意的话，我们可以稍后再谈论细节。”
languages.original_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: “嗯嗯。”{n}摄政王叹了口气，下垂的皮肤颤抖着。{/n}“如果我们拒绝行商浪人的援助，那恐怕就太缺乏尊重了。我们，阿伦托·奥塞罗，在此接受您的提议。如果您愿意的话，我们可以稍后再谈论细节。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Mmm». {n}La piel caída del regente tiembla cuando suspira.{/n} «Sería una falta de respeto rechazar la ayuda de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. Yo, Aaronto Orsellio, acepto por la presente su oferta. Si me lo permite, hablaremos de los detalles más adelante».
languages.original_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: «Mmm». {n}La piel caída del regente tiembla cuando suspira.{/n} «Sería una falta de respeto rechazar la ayuda de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente. Yo, Aaronto Orsellio, acepto por la presente su oferta. Si me lo permite, hablaremos de los detalles más adelante».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「うーむ」{n}摂政のたるんだ皮膚が震え、ため息をつく。{/n}「自由開拓者の援助を断るのは大変失礼なことだ。我々アーロント・オーセリオは貴君の申し出を受諾する。よろしければ、詳細は後ほどお話ししよう」
languages.original_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: 「うーむ」{n}摂政のたるんだ皮膚が震え、ため息をつく。{/n}「自由開拓者の援助を断るのは大変失礼なことだ。我々アーロント・オーセリオは貴君の申し出を受諾する。よろしければ、詳細は後ほどお話ししよう」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hmmm." {n}Die lose Haut des Regenten zittert, als er seufzt.{/n} "Es wäre hochgradig respektlos von uns, die Hilfe, {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} abzulehnen. Wir, Aaronto Orsellio, nehmen hiermit Euer Angebot an. Wenn Ihr gestattet, besprechen wir die Einzelheiten später."
languages.original_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: "Hmmm." {n}Die lose Haut des Regenten zittert, als er seufzt.{/n} "Es wäre hochgradig respektlos von uns, die Hilfe, {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} abzulehnen. Wir, Aaronto Orsellio, nehmen hiermit Euer Angebot an. Wenn Ihr gestattet, besprechen wir die Einzelheiten später."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Hmmm. » {n}La peau flasque du régent tremblote alors qu'il laisse échapper un long soupir.{/n} « Refuser l'aide d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} serait faire preuve d'un cruel manque de respect. Nous, Aaronto Orsellio, acceptons donc votre offre. Nous discuterons des détails plus tard, si vous le permettez. »
languages.original_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: « Hmmm. » {n}La peau flasque du régent tremblote alors qu'il laisse échapper un long soupir.{/n} « Refuser l'aide d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} serait faire preuve d'un cruel manque de respect. Nous, Aaronto Orsellio, acceptons donc votre offre. Nous discuterons des détails plus tard, si vous le permettez. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hımm." {n}Nefes alırken naibin sarkmış derisi titreşiyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in yardımını reddetmek, büyük kabalık olur. Biz, Aaronto Orsellio olarak teklifinizi kabul ediyoruz. Müsaade ederseniz detayları daha sonra konuşalım."
languages.original_text: "Hmmm." {n}The regent's sagging skin quivers when he sighs.{/n} "It would be highly disrespectful of us to refuse the aid of a Rogue Trader. We, Aaronto Orsellio, do hereby accept your offer. If you will allow, we shall discuss the details later."

traits.locale_text: "Hımmm." {n}Nefes alırken naibin sarkmış derisi titreşiyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'in yardımını reddetmek büyük kabalık olurdu. Biz, Aaronto Orsellio, teklifinizi kabul ediyoruz. Müsaade ederseniz detayları daha sonra konuşalım."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
